description: This file sets up a knowledge base using a PDF URL, integrates it with an agent that uses a language model, and demonstrates querying the agent about Thai curry recipes.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: LMStudio
classes.description: A language model class representing the LMStudio model used for generating responses.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database class interfacing with PostgreSQL using pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.
